title: Indian fish curry
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '1 bunch spring onions, coarsely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped root ginger', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/2 chilli, seeded and minced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '450g cod, cubed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
